entry.title: 测试001
entry.content:
这是Octopress部分功能的测试

This is some text.1. Other text.2.

Here comes some code.

测试一下数学公式

$X_1, X_2, X_3$

$$ \begin{align*} & \phi(x,y) = \phi \left(\sum{i=1}^n x_ie_i, \sum{j=1}^n y_je_j \right) = \sum{i=1}^n \sum{j=1}^n x_i y_j \phi(e_i, e_j) = \ & (x_1, \ldots, x_n) \left( \begin{array}{ccc}

  \phi(e_1, e_1) & \cdots & \phi(e_1, e_n) \\
  \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\
  \phi(e_n, e_1) & \cdots & \phi(e_n, e_n)
\end{array} \right)

\left( \begin{array}{c}

  y_1 \\
  \vdots \\
  y_n
\end{array} \right)

\end{align*} $$

$$ \begin{align} \mbox{Union: } & A\cup B = {x\mid x\in A \mbox{ or } x\in B} \ \mbox{Concatenation: } & A\circ B = {xy\mid x\in A \mbox{ and } y\in B} \ \mbox{Star: } & A^\star = {x_1x_2\ldots x_k \mid k\geq 0 \mbox{ and each } x_i\in A} \ \end{align} $$

段内插入LaTeX代码是这样的：$\exp(–\frac{x2}{2})$，试试看看吧

  1. test↩

  2. 必须被引用到才能实现上标↩
